decks.notes: This deck focuses on utilizing the combo potential of Nadu, Winged Wisdom along with Nomads en-Kor to draw cards and manipulate the top of your library. The deck also includes various control elements such as Force of Will, Teferi, Time Raveler, and Swords to Plowshares to protect your combo pieces and disrupt your opponent's strategy. The deck aims to efficiently generate card advantage and board control while setting up for a game-winning combo finish with Nadu and Nomads en-Kor.

The main concept of this Eldrazi Aggro deck is to quickly ramp up mana using Eldrazi Temple, Eye of Ugin, and other lands, allowing you to play powerful Eldrazi creatures like Thought-Knot Seer and It That Heralds the End early in the game. You also have disruptive elements like Chalice of the Void and Wasteland to hinder your opponent's strategy. The deck aims to overwhelm your opponent with fast, large threats while controlling the board with disruptive spells and land destruction.

This deck focuses on using disruptive spells and aggressive creatures to maintain tempo and control the game. It aims to quickly deploy threats like Murktide Regent and Nethergoyf while disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Thoughtseize, Daze, and Force of Will. The deck also includes card draw spells like Brainstorm and Ponder to ensure consistent access to threats and answers. The mana base is built to support both blue and black spells, while also including tool lands like Wasteland to disrupt the opponent's mana base.

This deck focuses on assembling the combo of Doomsday with cards like Dark Ritual, Lotus Petal, and Cabal Ritual to generate fast mana. The strategy involves using Personal Tutor to set up the perfect pile of cards with Thassa's Oracle as the win condition. Control elements like Thoughtseize, Force of Will, and Daze help protect the combo and disrupt opponents. Edge of Autumn allows for additional card draw while Street Wraith can be cycled for free. The key is to efficiently and quickly assemble the combo to win the game.

The main focus of this deck is to aggressively control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy through hand disruption and removal spells. It aims to quickly play powerful threats like Nethergoyf, Barrowgoyf, and Stalactite Stalker to pressure the opponent while also utilizing cards like Dauthi Voidwalker and Opposition Agent to disrupt their game plan. The deck also takes advantage of efficient mana acceleration with Dark Ritual and mana fixing with fetch lands to ensure a smooth and consistent game plan.

This deck focuses on quickly playing powerful Eldrazi creatures and disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Chalice of the Void and Glaring Fleshraker. It also utilizes ramp cards like Ancient Tomb and Eldrazi Temple to accelerate its threats onto the battlefield. The deck aims to apply early pressure on the opponent while also having disruption and protection elements to maintain control over the game. With a mix of efficient creatures and disruptive spells, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with its aggressive strategy.

This deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana with cards like Chrome Mox and Simian Spirit Guide to drop powerful threats like Blood Moon, Magus of the Moon, and Chalice of the Void to disrupt your opponent's game plan. The goal is to overwhelm your opponent with aggressive creatures like Pyrogoyf and Fury while controlling the board with removal spells like Sundering Eruption and Shatterskull Smashing. City of Traitors and Ancient Tomb also help accelerate your mana production, allowing you to quickly deploy your threats and secure victory.

The deck focuses on utilizing Mystic Forge along with artifacts such as Manifold Key, Voltaic Key, and Grim Monolith to generate a powerful combo that allows for quick and efficient mana ramping and card advantage. The inclusion of cards like Urza's Workshop, Karn, the Great Creator, and Urza's Tower further support the artifact-heavy strategy. By assembling the pieces of the combo and utilizing cards like Kozilek's Command and The One Ring, the deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent and secure victory through a combination of resource advantage and synergy.
